global.title: Forge - Mod loading failed
global.solution: This error is caused by Forge not being able to load a mod, please wait for someone to come help!

causes.text: Description: Mod loading error has occurred

global.title: OptiFine is broken!
global.solution: Either your OptiFine mod JAR has corrupted, or you have multiple of them in your mods folder.

global.title: GeckoLib is missing
global.solution: Download and install or re-enable the GeckoLib mod. (Click [here](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/geckolib/files) to download)

1.8,1.10,1.12.title: Multiplayer disabled
1.8,1.10,1.12.solution: To fix this error, you'll need to enable multiplayer on your Xbox account. To do so, [click here](https://account.xbox.com/en-us/Settings) and head to the Xbox One/Windows 10 Online Safety tab. If you are under the age of 18, you may need a parent/guardian to help you by creating an Xbox family and adding you to it.

1.8.title: Patcher 1.5 and below has an incompatibility with NotEnoughUpdates
1.8.solution: Update Patcher to version 1.6 or above.

1.8.title: Broken connected textures in a resourcepack
Why are your mods so outdated?!
1.8.solution: Uhmmm... You may need professional help here...
